thread.title: Tennessee set for afternoon kickoff against Alabama
thread.title_full: Tennessee set for afternoon kickoff against Alabama

title: Tennessee set for afternoon kickoff against Alabama
text:
Tennessee set for afternoon kickoff against Alabama Tennessee will face Alabama at 3:30 p.m. ET on CBS. Post to Facebook Tennessee set for afternoon kickoff against Alabama Tennessee will face Alabama at 3:30 p.m. ET on CBS.  //on.wbir.com/1ROVMov   Join the Conversation To   Tennessee set for afternoon kickoff against Alabama Ryan Callahan, govols247.com 9:04 p.m. EDT October 17, 2015 STARKVILLE, MS - NOVEMBER 16: Head coach Nick Saban of the Alabama Crimson Tide runs off the field after their 20-7 win over the Mississippi State Bulldogs at Davis Wade Stadium on November 16, 2013 in Starkville, Mississippi. (Photo by Kevin C. Cox/Getty Images) (Photo: Kevin C. Cox Getty Images) CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
The SEC announced Saturday that Tennessee's game Oct. 24 at 10th-ranked Alabama will kick off at 3:30 p.m. Eastern time, and it will be televised by CBS. 
CBS exercised a six-day selection option for which game it will show next week. The network chose between Tennessee at Alabama and Texas A&M at Ole Miss. The Aggies and Rebels will kick off at 7 p.m. Eastern on ESPN. 
Alabama (6-1, 3-1 SEC) has won its past eight meetings with the Vols (3-3, 1-2), including the Crimson Tide's 34-20 victory last year at Tennessee. 
The Tide is coming off a 41-23 win Saturday at No. 9 Texas A&M, while UT rallied for a 38-31 win over Georgia on Oct. 10. Read or Share this story: http://on.wbir.com/1ROVMov TOP VIDEOS
